title: All Black Everything
itunes:title: All Black Everything
description:
Today on the show we had actor Daniel Kaluuya call in where he spoke about his new film Judas and the Black Messiah, empowering black activist, getting into his role and more. Also, we had Shaka King the director of the movie Judas and the Black Messiah who spoke about the film, racisim in Hollywood and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a man that decided to put gorilla glue on his lips and had to get rushed to the ER all because he wanted to prove the woman who put gorilla glue spray on her hair wrong!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
